mapper.select: SELECT s.*,p.name as parkName FROM psp_sale_center s left join psp_park p on s.pid = p.pid WHERE phoneNum = #{phoneNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO psp_sale_center (sid, username, phoneNum, password, status, pid, type, createTime, lastLoginTime) VALUES (#{sid}, #{username}, #{phoneNum}, #{password}, #{status}, #{pid}, #{type} now(), now());
mapper.update:
UPDATE psp_sale_center
name = #{name},
phoneNum = #{phoneNum},
password = #{password},
status = #{status},
pid = #{pid},
type = #{type},
WHERE sid = #{sid};
